body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue
```console
$ spack install -j1 paraview@5.6.2+qt+python3 ^mesa~llvm ^python@3.6.8
... # and the relevant part of the error 
/home/mschramm/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-broadwell/gcc-8.3.1/qt-5.14.1-p5hlomyuhbezq22wgag5vfwrjokpr73e/bin/qhelpgenerator: symbol lookup error: /home/mschramm/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-broadwell/gcc-8.3.1/qt-5.14.1-p5hlomyuhbezq22wgag5vfwrjokpr73e/plugins/sqldrivers/libqsqlite.so: undefined symbol: sqlite3_column_table_name16
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux mschramm-precision-tower-5810.ae.iastate.edu 4.18.0-147.3.1.el8_1.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Nov 27 01:11:44 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ cat /etc/os-release 
NAME="Red Hat Enterprise Linux"
VERSION="8.1 (Ootpa)"
ID="rhel"
ID_LIKE="fedora"
VERSION_ID="8.1"
PLATFORM_ID="platform:el8"
PRETTY_NAME="Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.1 (Ootpa)"
```

files:
[spack-build-out.tar.gz](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4261996/spack-build-out.tar.gz)
[spack-build-env.tar.gz](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4261997/spack-build-env.tar.gz)
title: sqlite look up table error while building Paraview
